Music

Favorite Artists

  • Look Mum No Computer: Crazy, mad genius instruments, covers of ridiculous pop songs that are way better than the originals, and passionate music that stands thematicially and lyrically above much of the genre.

    • Better Off Alone

    • Modern Gas

    • Daydreamer

  • Bill Mallonee: A prolific and wildly talented artist who is appreciated by his fans but largely unknown. A remarkable songwriter whose work stretches from Brit-Pop to Americana.

    • Blister Soul

    • Wintergreen

    • Summershine

Random

  • Mental Minority: Dystopia Now

  • Cyber Dream: Chillwave-Synthwave Mix

  • I am generally quite ignorant in regards to Classical Music, however, here is a good recording of one of my favorite symphonies: Mozart Symphony 40, Scottish Chamber Orchestra
